segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Okay—so, um, the demo is next week in San Francisco.

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: Right. I spoke with Dana from OpenAI; she said the venue is near Market Street.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Great—can you send the calendar invite? You know, with the address and agenda.

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: Yes. Also, New York stakeholders want a short written summary.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: We should keep it concise: decisions, risks, and next steps.

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: I agree. The risk is the timeline; the plan is to ship on Friday.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: If we miss Friday, leadership will be unhappy—let's avoid that.

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: Understood. I'll follow up with Google Cloud support just in case.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Thanks. Also: please remove verbal tics like "um" and "you know" from the final notes.

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: Will do. Anything else before we wrap?
